banner.title: Harley-Devidson X440
banner.about: In India, the Harley-Davidson X440 cruiser bike can be purchased for between Rs. 2,97,610 and Rs. 3,46,444. There are 3 variations and 4 colors offered. It has disc brakes in the front and back.

banner.title: Lloyd 1.5 Ton 3 Star Inverter Split
banner.about: The Lloyd Split AC with Inverter Compressor has a variable speed compressor that adapts electricity automatically to the heat load and room temperature.

banner.title: Oakter Mini UPS
banner.about: Oakter Mini UPS for 12V WiFi Router Broadband Modem. Backup Upto 4 Hours which gives WiFi Router UPS Power Backup During Power Cuts | Current Surge & Deep Discharge Protection
